alert.note: Alert for Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; San Joaquin River Canyon; Upper San Joaquin River (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:01PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN FRESNO COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM PDT... At 600 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Wishon, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail, and isolated heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Localized heavy rainfall could result in nuisance flooding. Locations impacted include... Lake Thomas Edison, Huntington Lake, Lake Wishon, West Woodchuck Meadow, High Sierra, Florence Lake, Kaiser Point, Tamarack Summit, Wishon Dam, Upper Burnt Corral, and Dinkey Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; San Joaquin River Canyon; Upper San Joaquin River
